Key Match Events: The Utah Jazz edged past the Dallas Mavericks 115-113 to secure their first win at home.
Others: Klay Thompson ended his half with 11 points in 16 minutes as the Mavericks led 64-61.
Klay Thompson's scoring picked up steam in the second quarter against the Utah Jazz.
Klay Thompson had a mixed outing on Thursday as the Mavericks, sans Kyrie Irving and PJ Washington, sputtered on offense.
